body_html: I have pushed sci-libs/tensorflow-1.9.0_rc1-r2 to the gentoo tree with these patches. the system-libs USE-flag enabled the system ones, disabling the flag uses the bundled stuff like before in case there are any issues. Hopefully I dont get too many bugs filed because of it :D
body_text: I have pushed sci-libs/tensorflow-1.9.0_rc1-r2 to the gentoo tree with these patches. the system-libs USE-flag enabled the system ones, disabling the flag uses the bundled stuff like before in case there are any issues. Hopefully I dont get too many bugs filed because of it :D
body: I have pushed sci-libs/tensorflow-1.9.0_rc1-r2 to the gentoo tree with these patches. the system-libs USE-flag enabled the system ones, disabling the flag uses the bundled stuff like before in case there are any issues. Hopefully I dont get too many bugs filed because of it :D
